name.en: Serpent Night Dragon, the Wicked Dragon
name.ja: <ruby>邪<rt>じゃ</rt></ruby><ruby>悪<rt>あく</rt></ruby><ruby>龍<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby>エビルナイト・ドラゴン

text.en: You can Tribute 1 DARK monster from your hand or field; Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Serpent Night Dragon, the Wicked Dragon" once per turn. When this card is destroyed by battle: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; send it to the GY, then you can Special Summon this card.
